original_text: all movie long , city by the sea swings from one approach to the other , but in the end , it stays in formula -- which is a waste of de niro , mcdormand and the other good actors in the cast .
generated_text:
1. "The film's inconsistent tone and predictable plot make it a waste of talent from its all-star cast."
